reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and well-made, with a wonderful fit that falls just below the knee. They appreciate its comfort, noting it's not scratchy or itchy, and consider it good value for money. The color receives positive feedback, with one customer specifically mentioning the emerald green shade. Regarding size and length, while some find it true to measurements, others report it runs small and is too long for their height. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Mix of Classy and Comfortable
items.body: This dress is absolutely beautiful! The lace is incredibly soft, and the length is perfect—it falls just below my knee. The burgundy underdress paired with the lace overlay looks and feels so luxurious. I bought it for an outdoor wedding, and it’s the perfect balance of elegant and comfortable. The dress is really stretchy. Several have said it snags really easily but I haven’t worn it yet. I ordered a size up based on other reviews, but I probably should have gone with my regular size. I’m hesitant to exchange it because I’ve received returns before that smelled reeked of perfume, even though the tags were still attached. Read more
items.author: Pris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great dress at a great price
items.body: This is a beautiful dress. It is well Made and Elegant with lovely soft lace. Unfortunately the fit was not suiting me so I had to return it with regret. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good enough
items.body: It's ok. It looks nice and fits ok. It's a little shorter than I'd like. Read more
items.author: R. Dittmar

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my size and worth the money
items.body: The dress is exactly what I was expecting other than the little thing like getting in and out convenience. If you have someone to assist you zipping up the last few inches it's no problem, though. However, it is manageable. Material weight is not too thin or thick; it’s a perfect dress for a fall wedding I am attending. I am happy with the quality and shelouette. I am 5’2 and 107 lb 32 C. Purchased size S. There is just enough room for the upper body movement, but it's not a lot of room left. I would go up in size if you like more room or if you are D above in bra size. I am attending a rather formal wedding at the high-end hotel, and this is affordable, elegant yet not too flashy dress that would be approved by older generations. I looked around department store but couldn't find anything so decided to try this one after comparing everything I found on Amazon and other sites online. I am very happy with the purchase. Read more
items.author: Amy Sdareg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Red Dress
items.body: This is a beautiful dark red dress. It fit perfect and the lace is soft and comfortable. I am 5’6” and 190lbs. I ordered a 3X which is larger than I normally order, but it fit perfect. It was just too red for my granddaughters wedding. Read more
items.author: Kris

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs VERY small!
items.body: I ordered a size L as I am around a US size 12 so I thought the L would give me some breathing room. The dress itself is quite lovely, but I would say the size L was more like a US size 6 or 8! I am assuming the XL would also be too small. Read more
items.author: JAS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great party dress
items.body: Perfect fit, beautiful on my daughter, nice color Read more
items.author: Gramgram

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress.
items.body: Loved it way better than I thought I would. Fit was good. Little stretch to it. I'd buy another. Read more
items.author: Heather K

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Burgundy, Black, Dark Red, Dark Green, Navy, Champagne2, Lavender2, White, Blush, Purple, Grape, Royal Blue, Blush2, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
